posting_body: ['Rivers Edge', '115 Stone Mountain Road, Georgetown, TX, 78626', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 76', 'OR Text', '76', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Beautiful Community.', 'Peaceful Living.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1440 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'We make it easy to find the perfect home for you and your family here at Rivers Edge.', 'Choose one of our three or four bedroom rental homes in Georgetown, TX.', 'Each of our homes provides modern amenities for comfortable living.', 'Enjoy a 2-car attached garage, wood flooring, front yard, fenced backyards and more.', 'Call Now and schedule a tour of our rental homes in Georgetown for rent.', 'Features', '- 2 Car Attached Garage', '- 2-inch Faux Wood Blinds', '- Stand-up Showers', '- LED Lighting', '- Smart Thermostats', '- Irrigation Water Sensors*', '- Gas Range*', '- Trendy Grey Cabinetry*', '- Wood Flooring', '- Front Yard and Fenced Back Yards', '- Washer and Dryer Connections', '- Stand Alone Homes', '- Slate Grey Quartz Countertops*', '- Subway Tile Backsplash*', '*In Select Rental Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- On-site Professional Management', '- Hassle Free Lawncare', '- On-site Professional Maintenance', '- Amenity Center and Clubhouse with Wi-Fi', '- Resort-style Swimming Pool', '- Fitness Center', '- Dog Park', '- Park and Picnic Areas with Barbecue Grills', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed.', 'Two Pet Limit.', '9ltRCSxVNnu']
